description: *** WHAT'S NEW:(1.4.1) Minor bug fix update. (1.4.0) 1. Paid bills (incl. recurring bills) can be set to be automatically added into checkbook 2. Pin can be emailed. 3. Auto generation of check numbers can be customized. *** OVERVIEW:  Dough is a fully integrated checkbook solution for managing your personal finance on the Palm Pre and Pixi. With Dough you can manage unlimited accounts , set a budget, see your spending on visual graphs, track your spending trends, manage recurring transactions with calendar reminders, manage bills (incl. recurring bills) with calendar reminders and much more. *** COMPARISON TO OTHER CHECKBOOK APPS: No other checkbook app in the Palm catalog has the following features 1.Recurring transactions with calendar integration 2. Custom built icons to track transactions. 3. Complete budget, reports and bills integration including automatic bill insertion to checkbook  *** SUPPORT: Please email dough@codebeyond.mobi with questions or concerns. See our website at http://dough.codebeyond.mobil for more information.***
